about.name: Shubham Singh
about.description: I’m a passionate full-stack developer with practical experience in building secure, scalable, and high-performance web applications using Spring Boot and React. I specialize in implementing authentication, designing and consuming RESTful APIs, and crafting responsive, user-friendly interfaces. With a strong foundation in data structures and algorithms, I excel at solving complex problems efficiently. I'm constantly exploring new technologies, writing clean and maintainable code, and aiming to build impactful digital solutions that enhance user experiences and business processes.

projects.title: POLLGRAM – SOCIAL POLL MEDIA PLATFORM
projects.description: Engineered a robust and enterprise-ready backend for a social media platform focused on polls. Designed using MVC architecture and equipped with secure JWT-based authentication. Developed RESTful APIs for user registration, poll creation, and voting. The server is highly scalable, optimized for performance, and capable of handling large-scale user interactions efficiently from the  React frontend.

projects.title: Restaurant Management System
projects.description: Developed a desktop application to automate restaurant operations, featuring role-specific interfaces for    customers, chefs, and waiters. Implemented real-time order tracking and automated billing, enhancing  service efficiency and reducing manual errors.

projects.title: CLICKNDRIVE - Car Rental System
projects.description: Developed a web-based car rental application featuring real-time booking, AI-powered car suggestions via chatbot, and a dedicated driver interface for managing pick-up and drop-off tasks. Leveraged Firebase for seamless authentication and real-time database operations, enhancing user experience.

projects.title: Plant-O-Pedia
projects.description: Plant-O-Pedia is an interactive web platform showcasing 3D models of various herbal plants along with their medicinal uses. It allows users to explore plant details visually in a realistic format, making it a great educational tool for both learners and researchers.

projects.title: ResumeKraft
projects.description:
A dynamic and responsive web app that lets users create, customize, and preview resumes in real time.
Features include multiple themes, section-wise input forms, and instant resume generation on the same page.

certifications.certificationName: Java Spring Framework 6, Spring Boot 3, Spring AI Telusko
certifications.description: Master Java, Spring 6 and Spring Boot 3 , Spring JPA, Security, Spring AI, Docker and Microservices with Telusko

certifications.certificationName: The Complete JavaScript Course 2025: From Zero to Expert!
certifications.description: The modern JavaScript course for everyone! Master JavaScript with projects, challenges and theory. Many courses in one!
